faultTypeRule.ocl: InfixExpression.allInstances()->select(infixWithANDOperator | --Scope Conditions infixWithANDOperator.operator = InfixExpressionKind::CONDITIONAL_AND and --Filters Conditions let infixTemplate:ASTNode = infixWithANDOperator in infixTemplate.oclIsKindOf(InfixExpression) and let implicityContainers: OrderedSet(ASTNode) = infixTemplate->asOrderedSet()->closure(node: ASTNode | if node.oclContainer().oclIsKindOf(ASTNode) then node.oclContainer().oclAsType(ASTNode) else null endif ) in implicityContainers->exists(ifContainer:ASTNode | ifContainer.oclIsKindOf(IfStatement) and implicityContainers->includes(ifContainer.oclAsType(IfStatement).expression) ) ) ->reject(node: ASTNode | node.originalCompilationUnit.oclIsUndefined()) ->reject(node: ASTNode | node->closure(oclContainer())->exists(oclIsKindOf(Javadoc)))
